TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IXamlNameResolver

summary.span: 描述服務，這個服務可以傳回依 XAML 名稱指定的物件，或傳回會延後名稱解析的語彙基元。

span.span: Describes a service that can return objects that are specified by XAML name, or alternatively, returns a token that defers name resolution.

summary.span: 該服務也可以傳回 XAML 名稱範圍中所有具名物件的可列舉集。

span.span: The service can also return an enumerable set of all named objects that are in the XAML namescope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面不是外部實作典型的 XAML 情節因為它是服務。This interface is not intended for external implementation of typical XAML scenarios because it is a service. 標記延伸和類型轉換器，將 XAML 名稱解析為其他物件來源的相同 XAML 仍在 XAML 節點表示法時，可讓此服務。This service enables markup extensions and type converters to resolve XAML names to other objects from the same XAML source while they are still in a XAML node representation. 服務可以用來解決任何機制，依賴非線性存取在周圍 XAML 生產的 XAML 名稱向前參考。The service can be used to resolve forward references for any mechanism that relies on XAML names for nonlinear access to the surrounding XAML production. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[類型轉換器和 XAML 的標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md). 類型轉換器和標記延伸可以查詢XAML 物件寫入器叫用的值轉換行為時，會將 XAML 物件寫入器所提供的服務內容上以服務。Type converters and markup extensions can query for as a service on the service context that is provided by a XAML object writer, when the XAML object writer invokes value conversion behavior. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[類型轉換器和 XAML 的標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md)和[適用於類型轉換器和標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md)。For more information, see [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md) and [Service Contexts Available to Type Converters and Markup Extensions](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md). 此服務會公開可以延遲名稱解析 API。This service exposes an API that can defer name resolution. 無法針對部分的名稱-物件圖形的第一次傳遞中解析的名稱應該儲存，而用來建立修復語彙基元服務所實作的字眼。The metaphor implemented by the service is that names that cannot be resolved in a first pass against a partial name-object graph should be stored and used to create the fixup token. 預設的行為，所有這類名稱會送出的第二次傳遞的另一個解析作業。In the default behavior, all such names are submitted for another resolution attempt on a second pass. 在第二個階段中，整體名稱物件圖形已完成且所有修復語彙基元都就能解決。On the second pass, the overall name-object graph is complete, and all the fixup tokens are able to resolve. > [!NOTE] > 即使他們所允許的特定實作，在 XAML 中的向前參考無疑地具有帶來效能影響。Even if they are permitted by a particular implementation, forward references in XAML inevitably have performance consequences. 避免在實際執行品質 XAML 的最佳作法，盡可能向前參考。As a best practice for production-quality XAML, avoid forward references whenever possible.

summary.span: 傳回 XAML 名稱範圍中所有具名物件的可列舉集。

span.span: Returns an enumerable set of all named objects in the XAML namescope.
An enumerable set of objects.

returns.span: 在每個 中， 部分是字串，而 部分是在 XAML 名稱範圍中使用 名稱的部分。

span.span: For each , the component is a string, and the component is the object that uses the name in the XAML namescope.

summary.span: 傳回可修正會產生向前參考之特定標記模式的物件。

span.span: Returns an object that can correct for certain markup patterns that produce forward references.

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetFixupToken (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> names);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetFixupToken(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> names) cil managed
Public Function GetFixupToken (names As IEnumerable(Of String)) As Object
public: System::Object ^ GetFixupToken(System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::String ^> ^ names);

param.name: names
param.span: 可能之向前參考的名稱集合。

span.span: A collection of names that are possible forward references.

summary.span: 傳回可修正會產生向前參考之特定標記模式的物件。

span.span: Returns an object that can correct for certain markup patterns that produce forward references.

returns.span: 物件，提供將進行評估之查詢行為的語彙基元。

span.span: An object that provides a token for lookup behavior to be evaluated later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 現有的內部服務提供者，可提供標記延伸的結構描述內容中，而且型別轉換器可以實作此服務。不過，它們會傳回內部只有現有的 XAML 寫入器工作的預設 XAML 結構描述內容可處理類型。Existing internal service providers that are available in schema contexts for markup extensions and type converters can implement this service; however, they return an internal type that only the existing XAML writers that work under the default XAML schema context can process. 所有的向前參考的名稱解析時，使用者程式碼稱為重新分析每個清單中的名稱。When all the forward referenced names are resolvable, the user code is called to reparse each name in the list.

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetFixupToken (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> names, bool canAssignDirectly);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetFixupToken(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> names, bool canAssignDirectly) cil managed
Public Function GetFixupToken (names As IEnumerable(Of String), canAssignDirectly As Boolean) As Object
public: System::Object ^ GetFixupToken(System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::String ^> ^ names, bool canAssignDirectly);

param.name: names
param.span: 可能之向前參考的名稱集合。

span.span: A collection of names that are possible forward references.

param.name: canAssignDirectly
param.span: 表示立即將已解析的名稱參考指派給目標屬性。

span.span: to immediately assign the resolved name reference to the target property.

param.span: 表示呼叫使用者程式碼以重新剖析。

span.span: to call the user code for a reparse.
The default behavior is .

summary.span: 傳回可修正會產生向前參考之特定標記模式的物件。

span.span: Returns an object that can correct for certain markup patterns that produce forward references.

returns.span: 物件，提供將進行評估之查詢行為的語彙基元。

span.span: An object that provides a token for lookup behavior to be evaluated later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 現有的內部服務提供者，可提供標記延伸的結構描述內容中，而且型別轉換器實作這項服務。不過，它們會傳回只可處理之工作的預設 XAML 結構描述內容下現有 XAML 寫入器的內部類型。Existing internal service providers that are available in schema contexts for markup extensions and type converters implement this service; however, they return an internal type that can only be processed by the existing XAML writers that work under the default XAML schema context. 如果`canAssignDirectly`是`false`，所有正向的參考的名稱都是可解析，當使用者程式碼會呼叫以重新分析每個清單中的名稱。If `canAssignDirectly` is `false`, when all the forward referenced names are resolvable, the user code is called to reparse each name in the list.

public: property bool IsFixupTokenAvailable { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值判斷是否可以呼叫 ，以便將名稱解析為正向解析的語彙基元。

span.span: Gets a value that determines whether calling is available in order to resolve a name into a token for forward resolution.

value.span: 如果有 可實作來傳回正向解析的有用語彙基元，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if is available as an implementation that returns a useful token for forward resolution; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回`false`時不會傳回語彙基元，因為上現有的語彙基元的第二個傳遞的。This property returns `false` when does not return a token because a is involved in the second pass on an existing token.

summary.span: 發生於 XAML 處理器已將所有相關名稱註冊至支援 XAML 名稱範圍中時。

span.span: Occurs when a XAML processor has registered all the relevant names to the backing XAML namescope.
Resolves an object from a name reference.

MemberSignature.Value: public object Resolve (string name);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Resolve(string name) cil managed
Public Function Resolve (name As String) As Object
public: System::Object ^ Resolve(System::String ^ name);

span.span: The name reference to resolve.
Resolves an object from a name reference.

returns.span: 已解析的物件，或是 null。

span.span: The resolved object; or null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果傳回值是`null`，向前參考可能會存在。If a value is returned as `null`, a forward reference might exist. 想要支援向前參考的實作可以使用`FixupToken`模式透過和應用程式開發介面。Implementations that want to support forward references can use the `FixupToken` pattern through the and APIs.

span.span: When this method returns, if the returned object has any dependencies on unresolved references; otherwise, .

summary.span: 從名稱參考來解析物件，並提供追蹤值，報告是否已針對物件圖形用途完整初始化物件。

span.span: Resolves an object from a name reference, and provides a tracking value that reports whether the object is fully initialized for object graph purposes.

returns.span: 物件，提供將進行評估之查詢行為的語彙基元。

span.span: An object that provides a token for lookup behavior to be evaluated later.
